sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"激怒"之意。
means: provoke ： 指激起某人强烈的愤怒，以致令人作出反应。
irritate ： 通常指因受到不愉快的刺激而失去耐性，变得烦燥或恼怒。
aggravate ： 口语用词。指因长时间的反复言行而引起不快、烦躁或恼怒。

sentence.Network_en: If one firm goes under it could provoke a cascade of bankruptcies.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果一家公司倒闭，便有可能引发一连串的破产。

sentence.Network_en: His duty was to conciliate the people, not to provoke them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的职责是安抚那些人，而不是去激怒他们。

sentence.Network_en: Thinking angry thoughts can provoke strong physiological arousal.
sentence.Network_cn: 想着生气的事情能激起强烈的生理反应。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... prospect 景象,前景 provoke 激怒,刺激 procrastinate 拖延.
TOEIC词汇汇总 ... perceive 感知；察觉；理会 18. provoke 激怒；引起；激起 19. startle 惊吓；使吓一跳 20.
2012年六级高频词汇(1)_百度文库 ... protest v. 抗议，反对 provoke v. 激起 radiate v. 辐射状发出， 从中心向各方伸展出.
在街头挑衅(provoke)格斗(grapple). 后来,里夫的好友托尼(Tony)同贝纳多的妹妹玛利娅(Maria)一见钟情. 为了所爱的玛利娅,托尼想让.

list.abs: China says North Korean leader Kim Jong Il has told Beijing officials he is not planning to conduct another nuclear test , unless international pressure provokes Pyongyang to change its course .中国说，朝鲜领导人金正日对他们说，除非国际压力迫使平壤改变方针，否则朝鲜没有计划再次进行核试验。
provocation 挑衅；刺激provoked polarization 剌激极化prow 船头；机头；突出的前端；防冲设施头部.
19. provoke vt使……出现，唤起，引起provoke laughter引起一阵大笑20. demoralization n.道德败坏，纪律松弛，士气消沉.
制造_英文... ... stir up internal strife 制造内乱 provoke incidents 制造事端 grease the stairs;trouble making 制造麻烦.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'invoke, summon'): from Old French provoquer, from Latin provocare 'challenge', from pro- 'forth' + vocare 'to call'

entry.def: If you provoke someone, you deliberately annoy them and try to make them behave aggressively.

example.ex: He started beating me when I was about fifteen but I didn't do anything to provoke him...
example.tran: 在我快15岁时他开始打我，可我并没有任何招惹他的举动。

example.ex: I provoked him into doing something really stupid.
example.tran: 在我的刺激下他做了件非常愚蠢的事。

entry.def: If something provokes a reaction, it causes it.

example.ex: His election success has provoked a shocked reaction...
example.tran: 他的当选引起一片震惊。

example.ex: The destruction of the mosque has provoked anger throughout the Muslim world.
example.tran: 毁坏清真寺的行为激怒了整个伊斯兰世界。

sentences.sentence: "Her behavior provoked a quarrel between the couple"
"He is known to harry his staff when he is overworked"

auth_sentence.content: The storytelling elements provoke many of the fondest memories.
auth_sentence.res_content: The storytelling elements provoke many of the fondest memories.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The storytelling elements provoke many of the fondest memories.

auth_sentence.content: But it could further provoke Pyongyang and anger Beijing.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it could further provoke Pyongyang and anger Beijing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it could further provoke Pyongyang and anger Beijing.

auth_sentence.content: Christian protesters accused agitators of joining in to provoke violence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Christian protesters accused agitators of joining in to provoke violence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Christian protesters accused agitators of joining in to provoke violence.

stems_affixes.word_buile: invoc=invoke[v.祈求,恳求,[法律的]实施生效]+atory表形容词→adj.祈求的, 祈愿的
provoc=provoke[v.激怒,刺激]+ative……的→adj.激怒的,挑战的
revoc=revoke[v.废除,取消]+able能……的→adj.可废除的
equi平等+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→有两种声音→双关语
con共同+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→喊到一起→召集
e出+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→喊出思想等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 祈求,恳求,[法律的]实施生效
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→喊进去,请求
pro前+vok喊+e→在[你]前面喊→激怒[你]
re回+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→喊回来,取消

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"赞同,亲…"; 2. 也有"代替"之意; 3. 表示"向前,在前;预先"; 4. 表示"很多…"

pro赞同,亲…+slavery奴隶制→adj.赞成奴隶制的
pro=pro向前,在前;预先+ig=act做→做在前面,做得多→大量的
pro向前,在前;预先+fici做+ent……的→做在[别人] 前面→精通

pro向前,在前;预先+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的

pro很多…+fuse流→流很多→大量的
pro很多…+lif+ic……的→带来东西→多产的
pro很多…+sper希望+ous……的→希望很多→兴旺的
pro代替+louct说+or人→n. 议长;代言人
pro代替+noun名词→n.代名词
pro向前+blem抛→抛出问题
pro向前,在前;预先+cliv倾斜+ity表名词→向前倾斜
pro向前,在前;预先+fil线条+e→前面的线条
pro向前,在前;预先+gress走→向前走
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+logue说→在前面说→前言
pro向前,在前;预先+spect看→向前看→前景
pro很多…+fit=fic做→做很多→做得好→利润
pro向前,在前;预先+cure关心→关心在前→[想要]获得
pro向前,在前;预先+fess说→在前面说坦白
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+long长→向前拉长→延长
pro向前,在前;预先+mot动+e→向前动→促进
pro向前,在前;预先+pel推→向前推
pro向前,在前;预先+secu追随+te→追随到[法院]前面→检举;指控
pro向前,在前;预先+trud推,突出+e→向前突出
pro向前,在前;预先+vok喊+e→在[你]前面喊→激怒[你]
pro很多…+crastin明天+ate表动词→有许多明天明日复明日→拖延
pro很多…+create创造→创造很多→生儿育女
pro很多…+lifer=fer带来+ate表动词→带来很多生命→繁殖

means.word_mean: 激起; 惹怒;引起；引发

sentences.cn: 她不断地唠叨激怒了他。

jushi.english: The man was provoked by the insult.
jushi.chinese: 那个男人被侮辱激怒了。
他的愚蠢的举止引人发笑。
